metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33204 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
sysstat through 12.7.2 allows a multiplication integer overflow in check_overflow in common.c. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2022-39377.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-33204` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

isag - 11.2.0-1ubuntu0.3+esm2
sysstat - 11.2.0-1ubuntu0.3+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sysstat package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.0-1ubuntu0.3+esm2').
